origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FuturesAPI.analyze_prices', 'description': 'This function analyzes the price volatility of a specified commodity over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'commodity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of commodity, e.g., soybean, corn, wheat.'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for analysis, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}, {'name': 'analysis_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., price_volatility, trend_analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'description': 'The result of the price analysis.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FuturesAPI.analyze_prices, 它的参数输入如下: 'commodity'是'soybean', 'time_period'是'last_year', 'analysis_type'是'price_volatility'.
